description: 2019 was a great year for Vobees - we've made tremendous progress on [Vobees 2](https://v2.vobees.io/). Current Vobees 1 users who aren't using the translations feature can feel free to check it out and [migrate](https://v2.vobees.io/docs/migrating-from-v1-to-v2) to it! Otherwise we will work with you to make that happen in 2020 :)
title: Vobees 2019 Recap
